title: Anna (Turkish Version)
brief_description: Anna is the story of a young mother and her mentally handicapped son, Tom. The film traces the path followed by Anna in overcoming her distrust of professional health workers and outsiders. We follow Anna as she searches with increasing confidence, for the extra help that she is told is available to herself and young son Tom
